tree.name: Bobi Klintman
tree.note: Forward from Wake Forest, drafted 37th overall by Minnesota, traded to Detroit
tree.tradeDescription: Pistons acquired Klintman (#37) and Wendell Moore Jr. from Timberwolves for #53 pick, future pick, and cash

assetsGivenUp.name: 2024 DET 2nd Round Pick (#53)
assetsGivenUp.note: Pistons' own second-round pick sent to Minnesota
